name: Team Red vs Team Blue
description:
This is week eleven's Game a Week prototype. The theme was: Mini Game.

You need a total of four players which means you need to find three other friends to play with you. This game requires a computer, a designated line and a lot of space.

Please remember, you must not reveal which team you have chosen.

This game encourages violence, even rugby tackles. However, do so at your own risk. I am not responsible for any injuries sustained. Don't sue me, I'm a poor uni student.
